price: 7. Wanneer zij daarin geworpen worden zullen zij het (vreselijke) geluid van de adem horen wanneer deze borrelt.
arabic: إِذَآ أُلۡقُواْ فِيهَا سَمِعُواْ لَهَا شَهِيقٗا وَهِيَ تَفُورُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: idhā ul'qū fīhā samiʿū lahā shahīqan wahiya tafūru
